effect.message: message1:{Hello, I’m The Duke, I will help guide you to becoming King or Queen!}
message2:{Take a moment to survey your lands!}
message3:{Those people are part of a search party, looking for the Wizard Alastair.}
message_01_Duke:{Excellent, you have enough COINS. Let's EXPLORE!}
message_02_Duke:{That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! He must be nearby! Check the SATCHEL for clues.}

dialog.title: title:{Room to Grow}
dialog.description: description:{Use Coins to explore and expand yer Kingdom.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Collect more Coins from Castle Buildings, Shanty Houses or by selling items to explore more!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on a Gloomy Area to explore}

dialog.title: title:{Happiness is Castles is Explore}
dialog.description: description:{Increasing your Kingdom's Happiness unlocks new Castle Buildings that raise your Castle Level. Then you can explore to find Wizard Alastair!}

effect.message: message_01_Duke:{You've found an XP STAR! These special stars increase your LEVEL, shown in the blue XP METER above. Perform actions to earn more!}
message_02_Duke:{Marvelous! The GLOOM WOLF dropped one of SONJA'S ARROWHEADS. I wager she'd be HAPPY to have it back.}

effect.infoText: ClickToGive:{Click to give GIFTS to characters}

effect.message: GivingGifts:{Giving GIFTS to people makes them HAPPY. HAPPINESS allows you to expand your CASTLE!}
AmIGlad:{Am I glad to see you! While looking for ALASTAIR, I found NATHANIEL. He was fighting GLOOM WOLVES and dropped his fine Axe. Please return it to him.}

dialog.title: title:{Right to the Point}
dialog.description: description:{Thanks! I would have banished those Gloom Wolves myself if I hadn't lost my arrowhead. Have you seen it?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Giving Gifts to your Kingdom's residents also increases Happiness. Beloved rulers check back frequently to keep their people happy.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click Sonja to give her arrowhead}

dialog.title: title:{How Bazaar}
dialog.description: description:{If you built a Bazaar, you could trade items with your neighbors!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now that you've purchased the Bazaar, you'll need to build it.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Purchase 1 Bazaar from the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Housing Development}
dialog.description: description:{A happy kingdom needs a thriving economy. You can earn gold by building houses and collecting taxes from them.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The more houses you have, the more taxes you can collect to fund your kingdom’s growth! Cha-Ching!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Buy a Bungalow from the Market, build it, and click to collect taxes}

dialog.title: title:{Feeling Plucky}
dialog.description: description:{No farm would be complete without a Chicken!}
dialog.finish: finish:{ As your Kingdom grows, you'll be able to care for different animals, like Cows and Sheep!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Animals and other items can be bought in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Planting for the Future}
dialog.description: description:{Growing and selling crops is another way to earn money! Lets start with grapes.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Crops like grapes can be sold for Coins, given as Gifts, or used to craft other useful items.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on the Empty Farm Plot to buy and plant 1 Grape crop}

effect.message: message_01_Duke:{The more farm plots you have, the more CROPS your subjects can enjoy. Empty plots may be purchased from the BUILDING tab in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{The Plot Thickens}
dialog.description: description:{As your Kingdom grows, we will need more Crops. Buy 2 Empty Farm Plots from the Market so we can plant more.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Crops take some time to grow, but they're worth it!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Buy Empty Farm Plots from the Buildings section of the Market.}

effect.message: message_01_Duke:{Crops planted near WATER grow faster because they're irrigated! Move your Empty FARM Plots near the POND and harvest some Wheat.}

dialog.title: title:{Irrigated Wheat}
dialog.description: description:{Crops that are grown near water will grow faster.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Irrigated Wheat always tastes better, don't you agree?}
dialog.hint: hint:{Move the Farm Plots near the pond and harvest your Wheat.}

dialog.title: title:{Fortification}
dialog.description: description:{We should fortify this castle with some walls and towers!}
dialog.finish: finish:{This place is really starting to come together!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Purchase walls and a tower from your Great Hall}

condition.message: condition_1:{SWIPE your mouse over ITEMS to COLLECT them}

dialog.title: title:{Gather Clues}
dialog.description: description:{Swipe your mouse over items to collect them}
dialog.finish: finish:{Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Look at that loot! Point your mouse at items to collect them. You might need them later.}

effect.message: explain:{Sonja has given you a special task called a QUEST. Complete QUESTS to earn rewards and make your people HAPPY.}

dialog.title: title:{Some Snappy Title}
dialog.description: description:{You can use these tools to Move and Rotate my target.}
dialog.finish: finish:{That's the perfect spot!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click the tool and then the target to Move or Rotate it.}

effect.message: message_01:{You have collected enough blue XP STARS to gain a level! Each level unlocks new items in the MARKET and increases your ENERGY. Claim your new LEVEL now!}

effect.infoText: LevelUp:{Level Up to regain ENERGY and unlock items in the MARKET}

condition.message: condition_1:{CLICK your AVATAR to LEVEL UP}

effect.message: message_01_Duke:{Look at SONJA. The exclamation mark means that she needs something. Can you help her by completing her QUEST?}

dialog.title: title:{Level Up!}
dialog.description: description:{Click your Avatar to level up!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Leveling up gives you Energy and unlocks new items in the Market.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click your Avatar to level up}

dialog.title: title:{Well Earned Rewards}
dialog.description: description:{Collect the Experience Stars}
dialog.finish: finish:{Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Collect the Experience Stars}

dialog.title: title:{Shiny Happy Doobers}
dialog.description: description:{Collect the happy faces}
dialog.finish: finish:{Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Collect the happy faces}

condition.message: condition_1:{CLICK on SONJA to give her a GIFT.}

effect.message: explainGifts:{Giving Gifts to people makes them HAPPY. HAPPINESS helps your kingdom to GROW!}
thankYou:{Thank you, Highness! Take this axe. My friend Nathaniel dropped it while fighting off those blasted Gloom Wolves.}
message_01_Duke:{For this quest, let's build a BUNGALOW from the MARKET.}

dialog.title: title:{Home Free}
dialog.description: description:{Your Majesty, there can be little Happiness where Gloom Wolves lurk. Please banish any that you encounter!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Huzzah! With the Gloom Wolves gone, your Kingdom is happier. You are a valiant banisher of beasties!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on the Gloom Wolves to banish them.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place the House foundation on the ground}

effect.infoText: ClickToView:{Click the ICON to view the QUEST}
ClickOnRocks:{Click on ROCKS to mine STONE}
ClickOnTrees:{Click on TREES to chop WOOD LOGs}
ClickToComplete:{Click the ICON to complete the QUEST}

effect.message: message_01_Duke:{A magnificent Great Hall! Now you may name your KINGDOM!}

dialog.title: title:{Go Fullscreen}
dialog.description: description:{Click the Fullscreen button}
dialog.finish: finish:{Fullscreen mode activated}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click the Fullscreen button}

condition.message: condition_1:{CLICK the GROUND and DRAG to look around}

dialog.title: title:{Scroll the view}
dialog.description: description:{Scroll the view}
dialog.finish: finish:{Scrolling allows you to look around}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click the ground and drag to look around}

dialog.title: title:{Taming the Wild}
dialog.description: description:{This area became overgrown while it was under the Gloom. Can you help us reclaim it by clearin' Grass and placin' Wooden Fences? }
dialog.finish: finish:{Aye, that's better. We'll tame this wilderness yet!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on Grass and Brambles to clear em'.}

dialog.title: title:{Lumber Party}
dialog.description: description:{A Lumber Camp will help ye gather Wood to build more buildings.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Gatherin' Buildings like this Lumber Camp collect resources while ye relax... or clear some brambles. Yer choice.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Buy 1 Lumber Camp from the Market and build it}

effect.message: HelpNathaniel:{It looks like Nathaniel could use some help. See what QUESTS he has to offer.}

dialog.title: title:{Harvest Grapes}
dialog.description: description:{When your Grapes are ready, click to harvest them.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Mmm! Those Grapes look tasty!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on 2 Grapes to harvest them.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place the Great Hall from Your Inventory}

dialog.title: title:{Castle Building}
dialog.description: description:{Castles are unlocked by happiness. Here, we were saving this one fer ye upon yer return.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Odin's beard! That's a mighty Great Hall. Ye can click on it to buy more Castle Buildings!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory and build it.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tax the Shanty House to collect Coins}

effect.message: message_01_Duke:{COINS allow you to buy items and buildings to keep your residents HAPPY and grow your KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.}

dialog.title: title:{Build House}
dialog.description: description:{Click Sonja's House to complete it.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now that's a snazzy house.}
dialog.hint: hint:{CLICK Sonja's House to build it}

condition.message: condition_4:{Tax the Bungalow to collect Coins}

effect.message: message_01_Duke:{COINS allow you to buy items and buildings to keep your residents HAPPY and grow your KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.}

dialog.title: title:{Resourceful}
dialog.description: description:{Gather Rocks and Wood to complete Sonja's House.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now you have enough resources to build.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Mine Rocks for Stone and chop Trees for Wood}

dialog.title: title:{What An Axe}
dialog.description: description:{Nathaniel would really love a Woodsman's Axe}
dialog.finish: finish:{This Woodsman's Axe will make chopping trees a snap!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Give Nathaniel 1 woodsman's axe}

dialog.title: title:{Cluck Cluck Here}
dialog.description: description:{The blasted Gloom scared off all of our farm animals. Would ye purchase us some new ones?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Thank ye, Majesty! Farm animals produce resources that we can give as gifts or use in craftin'.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Animals can be purchased in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory}

dialog.title: title:{Build the Keep}
dialog.description: description:{I've given you your first Castle Building, the Great Hall! Find it in your Inventory and build it.}
dialog.finish: finish:{You have built a magnificent Great Hall, Majesty!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory and build it}

dialog.title: title:{Hold the Oats}
dialog.description: description:{A handful of wet oats used to be enough on the march, but no longer.}
dialog.finish: finish:{These buns are toothsome!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Buy Wheat seeds; craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Hot Buns}

dialog.title: title:{A Good Knight's Rest}
dialog.description: description:{The name's Tom. I've been searching the Gloom for a nice place to settle.}
dialog.finish: finish:{This looks like a good place to settle.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Castle components are in the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Shelter for the Knight}
dialog.description: description:{Aye, I may be willing to give this kingdom a goo.}
dialog.finish: finish:{This could be the nicest place I've ever lived. *sniff*}
dialog.hint: hint:{Get logs from trees and stone from rock piles}

dialog.title: title:{Knight Fight}
dialog.description: description:{Thieves have stolen my Tabard and I want it back!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Very pleased, my Laird, to have my Tabard back and bash those thieves.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Bash 5 thieves to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{A Knight's Work}
dialog.description: description:{I need weapons and equipment to train new knights.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I can now make men out of these boys.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Get Swords by crafting, trading or asking neighbors.}

dialog.title: title:{After Them, Lads!}
dialog.description: description:{These lads are ready to show their metal mettle *wink*.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Good lads, these!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Banish Beasties wherever you find them}

dialog.title: title:{A Penny for a Pie}
dialog.description: description:{A hardboiled egg was real luxury in my campaigning days.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Ooh! A Pot Pie is a feast in one dish.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Tend Chickens to get Eggs and craft Chicken Pot Pie in the Kitchen.}

dialog.title: title:{The Spice of Life}
dialog.description: description:{I developed a taste for spicy foods in me travels.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Ha, ha! These Sausages remind me of golden-haired girls and fine beer!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Craft, Trade, or ask neighbors for 10 Spicy Sausages.}

dialog.title: title:{A Helmet for a Pillow? Nae!}
dialog.description: description:{There will be more comforts for me noo.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I can rest my weary bones, thank yea forsooth.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Cotton Cloth and Bedding}

dialog.title: title:{A Self-Sufficient Town}
dialog.description: description:{A little industry around here would make life easier for all.}
dialog.finish: finish:{This kingdom's as busy as a one-armed wallpaper hanger!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Purchase Gathering Buildings from the Market; harvest them to gain resources.}

dialog.title: title:{Natural Resources}
dialog.description: description:{The forest will provide you with the resources we need to construct buildings. Gather wood logs and stone.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Take only what you need and the forest will always be with you.}
dialog.hint: hint:{CHOP trees, and MINE rocks}

dialog.title: title:{Resourceful}
dialog.description: description:{Gather Rocks and Wood.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now you have enough resources to build.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Mine Rocks for Stone and chop Trees for Wood}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click in the Gloom to explore}
hint_2:{Click on Gloom Wolves to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{When Wolves Attack!}
dialog.description: description:{We are under attack! Bash those beasties!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Bye bye, beasties! Good job, your majesty!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on the Gloom Wolves to banish them.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase the Mining Camp in the Market}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect stone from a mining camp}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Mining Camp to collect stone}

dialog.title: title:{A Miner Concern}
dialog.description: description:{Gathering stone takes a lot of energy. A mining camp can do a lot of the work for you. Go ahead and build one.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Collecting stone will take much less of your energy now..}
dialog.hint: hint:{Build a mining camp and collect stone from it.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Rid the kingdom of Gloom Wolves}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Gloom Wolves to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{The Purge}
dialog.description: description:{The beasties in your kingdom make the people unhappy. Clear the kingdom of beasties so that the people can be happy again.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Hooray! Now the people can be very happy! You are doing so well!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click the Gloom Wolves to banish them.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Gloom Wolves to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Trial by Beastie}
dialog.description: description:{Oh no! Those beasties are back, and they brought a friend. Bash them back to the Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Very good bashing, your majesty.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on the Gloom Wolves to banish them.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase energy items from the market}

dialog.title: title:{Be Prepared}
dialog.description: description:{Bashing beasties can take a lot of energy. Luckily, you can store up energy items for use when beasties attack.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now you'll be ready the next time beasties attack.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Store up 10 energy consumable items.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase the Guardpost in the Great Hall}

dialog.title: title:{On Guard}
dialog.description: description:{There are a lot of beasties around here. You should build a Guardpost to help defend against them.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Those beasties will think twice before they come here again.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Purchase a Guardpost from the Great Hall.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click in the Gloom to explore}

dialog.title: title:{Be Proactive}
dialog.description: description:{Have you noticed the beasties always come from the gloom? Maybe we can find more beasties by exploring the gloom.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The gloom is full of beasties! That is a good thing to know.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click in the gloom to explore.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click rocks to gather stone}
hint_2:{Castle walls can be purchased in the Great Hall}

dialog.title: title:{Fortification}
dialog.description: description:{If we built some strong castle walls they might keep the beasties out.}
dialog.finish: finish:{You're doing well! Those are some good walls you built there.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Castle walls can be purchased from the Great Hall.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Real task is Visit 5 Neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Charisma}
dialog.description: description:{Reach out, your Majesty. To paraphrase the poet, no kingdom is an island, entire of itself.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Strengthen the ties of friendship, your Majesty. They may be very useful in the time ahead.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Landscape Architecture}
dialog.description: description:{Your kingdom is not a workhouse. Soften the edges and the people will be elated.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Yes, much more livable and likable. Your subjects will be happier and more attached.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Characters to give them Gifts}
hint_2:{Give Gifts and Complete quests for Characters to raise Happiness}

dialog.title: title:{A Gift for You}
dialog.description: description:{Reward subjects worthy of attention and those who are not as strong, but truly trying.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Those were nice touches, your Majesty. They may write songs about you yet.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}
hint_1:{Real task is trade 5 items}

dialog.title: title:{The Advantage of Trade}
dialog.description: description:{Learn to specialize and trade for the specialites of others. Self-sufficiency is a fool's objective.}
dialog.finish: finish:{See how trade strengthens the bonds between kingdoms. It should be a strength of yours.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces}
hint_2:{Click Castle Buildings to Tax them}
hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{Nobility}
dialog.description: description:{Raise up the Castle. It is a symbol, not doubt, but may be your bulwark someday.}
dialog.finish: finish:{A noble Castle helps the ruler appear more noble, as well, to all.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Real task is complete 10 quests}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Compassion}
dialog.description: description:{An exceptional ruler listens to the people and helps them for the good of all.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Very compassionate, your Majesty. The people recognize a ruler who is true.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 5 Water tiles in the Nature tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Buy in the Nature tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Like a Flowing River}
dialog.description: description:{A true ruler is like a river: powerful and constant, yet capable of sustaining life.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Like the plants and animals depend on the river for life, so do your subjects depend on you.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Animals tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Click on Animals to Feed}

dialog.title: title:{Restoring the Flocks}
dialog.description: description:{The creatures driven off can prosper here once more. Give them that opportunity.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The people will be much more rooted and content with animals back.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Shelter from the Storm}
dialog.description: description:{Give the people homes they can take as their own and they will do well.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Those are fine homes. Most have never seen the like. }

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Farm Plots to Plant new Crops}
hint_2:{Click on Farm Plots to Plant new Crops}
hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{The Good Earth}
dialog.description: description:{The land can provide more than simple sustenance. Demonstrate what it can do.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Spice and fiber for cloth. You are opening the eyes of the people to what might be.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Raise your Castle Level to Explore}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Courage}
dialog.description: description:{Expand, your Majesty. Regain what is rightfully yours. You are a force for good.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Enemies are becoming aware of you. Taking back what is yours will not get easier.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Gloom Rats to Banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Begone Beasties}
dialog.description: description:{These vermin are pests and make the people unhappy. You must Banish them.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Be sure of it, there will be more of these Beasties. Prepare to deal with these plagues.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Gloom Wolves to Banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Wolves at the Door}
dialog.description: description:{The stakes are raised, but you are ready, are you not?}
dialog.finish: finish:{You made short work of those dark howlers. Your people take pride in that.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Beasties to Bash them}

dialog.title: title:{Like a Good Neighbor}
dialog.description: description:{Your neighbors will value you more when you lessen their burdens}
dialog.finish: finish:{Neighbors will be strongly inclined to return a good deed.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Rescue one Person from the Gloom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Explore new areas to find Characters to rescue}
hint_2:{Real task is accept 1 new quest}
hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{Bring in from the Dark}
dialog.description: description:{There are good people lost in the GLOOM. Seek them and save them.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Those you have saved will not forget.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Trees to Chop them}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Strength}
dialog.description: description:{A true ruler must be as strong and sturdy as the walls of the castle. You have much work to do.}
dialog.finish: finish:{A good start. It will take great strength to push back the Gloom. More work must be done.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Rocks to Mine them}

dialog.title: title:{Harder Than Stone}
dialog.description: description:{This is a different time. Leaders must earn their rank. Gathering Stone is an apt demonstration.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Much Stone will be needed in the future as well, but the people have seen you don't shirk.}

condition.hint: hint_2:{Real task is move 2 buildings}
hint_2:{Mine Rocks to Collect Granite}

dialog.title: title:{Weight of the World}
dialog.description: description:{Being adaptable will be useful. Be prepared to rearrange the kingdom as needed.}
dialog.finish: finish:{That looks better. The people can appreaciate a ruler with a plan.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase new Buildings in the Building tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Strength with Purpose}
dialog.description: description:{There is no rest, your Majesty. There is more work to do and new residents will need shelter.}
dialog.finish: finish:{You build quickly, yet sturdily. The people will respect that.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Clubs in the Workshop or Trade with friends}
hint_2:{Buy Archery Targets in the Docrations tab of the Market}
hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{A Show of Strength}
dialog.description: description:{There is conflct ahead. Bare knuckles won't do. Begin gathering weapons.}
dialog.finish: finish:{These are very simple weapons, but they will serve for now. You will need better ere long.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}
hint_3:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Wisdom}
dialog.description: description:{There are also useful things to be found underground. Open the earth to see.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The mines and waters here are rich with resources. They are yours for the taking, if you are careful.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Forge items at a Workshop}
hint_2:{Cook items at a Kitchen}
hint_3:{Create items at a Studio}

dialog.title: title:{Arts And Crafts}
dialog.description: description:{Artisans and craftsmen are drawn here by the opportunity. Set them loose.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The kingdom hums with energy. Work is being done.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Items to increase Crafting Level}
hint_2:{Craft Items at a Workshop, Kitchen or Studio}

dialog.title: title:{On to Mastery}
dialog.description: description:{Think again of trade, your Majesty. You craftsmen should specialize to enhance the value of trade.}
dialog.finish: finish:{An excellent choice of skill. But be flexible. Something else may work better in the future.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces}
hint_2:{Click Houses and Castle Buildings to Tax them}
hint_3:{Tax Houses and Castle Buildings for Coins}

dialog.title: title:{The Prudent Ruler}
dialog.description: description:{Most believe coins make the world go round. I know better, but that's another story.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The best things in life may indeed be free, but a healthy balance of coins is a comfort.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces}
hint_2:{Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces}
hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{A Worthy Castle}
dialog.description: description:{You are close to completing this challenge, your Majesty. A few touches to the Castle, perhaps.}
dialog.finish: finish:{You have proved worth, your Majesty. The kingdom is truly yours. I see great things for you.}

condition.hint: hint:{Click dead trees to clear them}

dialog.title: title:{Gloom Damage}
dialog.description: description:{Hearts of Oak! Let’s clear Gloom damage to make room for new forest growth.}
dialog.finish: finish:{What the Gloom did to this forest is a crime. But it will be healthy and strong again, I swear.}

condition.hint: hint:{Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom}

dialog.title: title:{Saving the Forest}
dialog.description: description:{Freeing another area of Gloom saves more trees from its poison.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Pine and dandy. We can restore this area now.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Oaks in the Market, Nature Category}
hint_2:{Buy Pines Trees in the Market, Nature Category}

dialog.title: title:{Up with Trees}
dialog.description: description:{Hearts of oak! Now the replanting begins.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Wonderful! Soon enough those trees will be tall and strong.}

condition.hint: hint:{Click on neighbors to visit them.}

dialog.title: title:{The Far Side of the Hill}
dialog.description: description:{I’d like to see how nearby forests are being managed. Let’s go visiting.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Hickory, chicory! The fight against the Gloom is spreading.}

condition.hint: hint:{Move Farm Plots near water to make them Irrigated}

dialog.title: title:{The Watershed Test}
dialog.description: description:{Healthier crops will help the land overall.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Tree-rific! Better crops mean better water and better trees!}

condition.hint: hint:{Click on trees to chop and gather Wood}

dialog.title: title:{The Axeman Cometh}
dialog.description: description:{Take care of the forest and it will provide for us.}
dialog.finish: finish:{A mighty tree, a sharpened axe, a pile of lumber laid in stacks.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Super Chop from the Market, Consumables Category}
hint_2:{Use Super Chop from the Inventory, Consumables Category}

dialog.title: title:{Done in a Flash}
dialog.description: description:{Quaking aspens! Make it a rule to use the right tool.}
dialog.finish: finish:{See! The man with the axe is also a king (of diamonds). What a card!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Iron Axe at a Workshop}
hint_2:{Craft, Trade, or Ask Friends for Iron Axes}

dialog.title: title:{The Fir Will Be Flying}
dialog.description: description:{I've got Axes to grind, but new ones would be a better choice.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Sweet gum! These new Axes are cutting edge!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Willows in the Market, Nature Category}
hint_2:{Buy Birch Trees in the Market, Nature Category}

dialog.title: title:{Willows Wave to Me}
dialog.description: description:{Replenish the forest now so there is more wood later.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Planting trees is investing in mother nature's bank. Good work!}

condition.hint: hint:{Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom}

dialog.title: title:{Expectation of Exploration}
dialog.description: description:{What else is out there? Friend or foe? If we don't push on we'll never know.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Free the forest, make more room, lower the boom on the nasty Gloom.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on a Gloom Beastie to Banish him.}

dialog.title: title:{Declaration of Beastie War}
dialog.description: description:{These Beasties are a plague! Drive them out, I say!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Tis a fatal err to cross his path, comes the sharpened end of the hunter's wrath.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Club at a Workshop}
hint_2:{Craft, Trade, or Ask Friends for Clubs}

dialog.title: title:{Gearing Up for Beastie War}
dialog.description: description:{Weapons will make banishing easier.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Beasties in the land? They won't stand, when they see us coming with a swinging club in hand.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Harvest crops on Farm Plots}
hint_2:{Banish any Gloom Rats that spawn from Harvesting}

dialog.title: title:{Banished!}
dialog.description: description:{An Invitation to the Club}
dialog.finish: finish:{Did you hear about the Rat that walked into a Club? Heh!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Harvest crops on Farm Plots}
hint_2:{Gather Rat tails from Banishing Gloom Rats}

dialog.title: title:{Hit Them Where It Hurts!}
dialog.description: description:{Keep up the campaign and make the Rats feel the pain.}
dialog.finish: finish:{A banished Rat's Tail, a smelly dead snail, both are destined for the garbage pail.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Light Breakfasts at the Kitchen}
hint_2:{Craft, trade, or ask friends for Light Breakfasts}

dialog.title: title:{Off to a Good Start}
dialog.description: description:{To get an early start a good breakfast plays its part.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Give me toasted bread and a well-cooked egg, and we'll get'er done or call me Meg.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Spears at the Workshop}
hint_2:{Craft, trade, or ask friends for Spears}

dialog.title: title:{Armed And Dangerous}
dialog.description: description:{Tougher foes require better weapons.}
dialog.finish: finish:{A little song, a little dance, a sharpened Spear in the pants.}

condition.hint: hint:{Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom}

dialog.title: title:{Seek And Ye Shall Find}
dialog.description: description:{Keep pushing the Gloom and see what we flush out.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Well look what’s here; glad we brought a Spear.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Animals will periodically be hunger, click animals with an arrow above them}
hint_2:{Banish Gloom Wolves that show up when tending Animals}

dialog.title: title:{Wolves at the Door}
dialog.description: description:{Let's put those Spears to good use.}
dialog.finish: finish:{We've got the Spears, the Wolves have their fears.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Animals will periodically be hunger, click animals with an arrow above them}
hint_2:{Gather Wolf Hair from Banishing Gloom Wolves}

dialog.title: title:{Missing Something, Wolfie?}
dialog.description: description:{Weird Wolves are still around, so let's run them to ground.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Not long ago it was the fir flying; now it’s the fur.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Get Pails of Water by Fishing}
hint_2:{Craft, trade, or ask friends for Vegetable Juice}

dialog.title: title:{Thirsty Work, This Banishing}
dialog.description: description:{Let's take a break, our thirst to slake.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Needs some wind in your sail? Get some water in your pail.}

condition.hint: hint:{Buy torches from the Decoration section of the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Bump in the Night}
dialog.description: description:{I heard something moving near my house last night, but I'm not scared! I might be able to find out what it is if you place torches near my house.}
dialog.finish: finish:{It came back last night! I couldn't tell what it was, it avoided the light.}

condition.hint: hint:{Craft Birdseed from the Studio.}

dialog.title: title:{Cheeps in the Night}
dialog.description: description:{I heard a bird chirping all last night. I'll need some bags of Birdseed to keep it quiet.}
dialog.finish: finish:{All of the Birdseed was gone. This must be one big bird! I will investigate more.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need.}
hint_2:{Grow Flax from Farm Plots or Trade neighbors for Flax.}

dialog.title: title:{Banging in the Night}
dialog.description: description:{I heard some loud banging late last night! I’d like to feed it different things to figure out what it is. I'd like to try Oats and Flax.}
dialog.finish: finish:{This thing has a big appetite. All of the Oats and Flax were gone this morning!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Wooden Handles at the Workshop.}
hint_2:{Harvest the Cotton from farms or Trade Neighbors for it.}
hint_3:{Craft Oil at the Kitchen or Trade Neighbors for it.}

dialog.title: title:{Search the Night}
dialog.description: description:{It's time I go out and search for this creature. I need some materials for hand torches.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I followed the creature for a time, but he got away. It's legs were much much longer than mine.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Get Honey from clearing flowers. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.}
hint_2:{Get Berries from clearing grasses. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.}

dialog.title: title:{Attraction}
dialog.description: description:{This creature is fast. I'll try to attract it with some natural food. I love sweets, maybe the creature will too.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I not sure what happened, everything was eaten. I only closed my eyes for a second, I promise!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Flour Sacks in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it}
hin_2t:{Get Pails of Water by fishing}

dialog.title: title:{Big Foot!?!}
dialog.description: description:{I found a huge footprint! I need some materials to make cast of it.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Alastair thinks it could be a giant. This might be a new discovery! I named him Big Footy.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Fried Fish in the Kitchen.}
hint_2:{Craft Hard-Boiled Eggs in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it}

dialog.title: title:{Attraction 2}
dialog.description: description:{I've named the giant, Big Footy, do you think it will want some eggs and fish? I like eggs and fish, I'm sure it will too.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Everything was gone again this morning. This Big Footy sure has an amazing appetite!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Noodles in the Kitchen.}
hint_2:{Craft Noodles in the Kitchen.}

dialog.title: title:{Attraction 3}
dialog.description: description:{I still don't know what Big Footy could be. It sure eats anything I give it. Let's try 2 more things.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I finally found something Big Footy didn't like. None of the Noodles where eaten! }

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on water to catch fish}

dialog.title: title:{Bait and Switch}
dialog.description: description:{Could you use that fine fishing pole of yours to catch us some fish?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Mmm, what a scrumptious catch! Just like that Nathaniel...}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on any water to catch fish.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Sell Fish from your Inventory}

dialog.title: title:{Fishmonger}
dialog.description: description:{If you aren’t in the mood for Fish, you can sell ‘em for some quick gold!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Selling items is a good way to get gold, for those who feel the need to EARN it.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Sell Fish from your Inventory.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Houses to collect taxes.}

dialog.title: title:{Shanty Raid}
dialog.description: description:{With all these Houses, you could get heaps of gold by plundering - - er, collecting taxes.}
dialog.finish: finish:{You can plunder MY Bungalow anytime!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on Houses to collect taxes.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Houses from the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{New Shanties}
dialog.description: description:{We could use some more houses, if you have the Wood and Stones for it!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Your fine Bungalow really swabs my deck!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Buy and build Houses from the market.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Great Hall to build Castle Towers}

dialog.title: title:{Erecting a Tower}
dialog.description: description:{Building Houses is fun, but erecting Towers is my specialty!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Blow me down, that's the biggest Tower I've ever seen!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on the Great Hall to build Castle Towers.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Castle Buildings to collect Gold}

dialog.title: title:{Golden Tower}
dialog.description: description:{I could admire your Tower for hours, but I'd enjoy some gold even more.}
dialog.finish: finish:{That’s a quite a handful of booty you have there!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on Castle Buildings to collect Gold.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click in the Gloom to Explore}

dialog.title: title:{Land, Ho!}
dialog.description: description:{Take that fine booty of yours and get exploring!}
dialog.finish: finish:{This is a great place to hide some loot. In fact... I DID hide some here, before the Gloom!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click in the Gloom to Explore.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on natural objects to clear them}

dialog.title: title:{Clearing the Bush}
dialog.description: description:{If you're going to find my loot, you'll need to clear the land!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now you'll be able to find my loot, for certain!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click on flowers and other natural objects to clear the land.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Explore to reveal Sonja's Chest}

dialog.title: title:{Sonja's Chest}
dialog.description: description:{Have you seen my Chest? It’s large, curvy, and ripe for plundering!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Here, take my pirate flag. Now you’ll always be ready for a Jolly Rogering!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Explore to reveal Sonja's Chest.}

condition.hint: hint_2:{Should be Place 5 Flowers}

dialog.title: title:{From Gloom to Bloom}
dialog.description: description:{I love nature! Making the kingdom a greener place will help push away that nasty Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Ohh, thank you! Together we can make the kingdom vibrant and happy again!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops}
hint_2:{Click Fully grown Crops to Harvest}

dialog.title: title:{24 Carrots}
dialog.description: description:{The poor bunnies out in the Gloom need our help! Let's grow some food for them.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Wow, those little guys were hungry!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Animals tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops}

dialog.title: title:{Chicken Lover}
dialog.description: description:{Adding lots of animals will help bring new life to the kingdom. Chickens is a good start.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The fluffly little chicks are so cute!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Kitchen or Trade with Friends}
hint_2:{Should be use Feed on 1 Chicken}

dialog.title: title:{Bird Feeder}
dialog.description: description:{The chicks grow up fast and strong with the proper diet. Bird seed will hit the spot.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The chickens look healthier already.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Animals tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops}

dialog.title: title:{A Bit Sheepish}
dialog.description: description:{The kingdom could use some four-legged friends, too. How about some sheep?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Aww, they look like puffy little clouds!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Click Design Mode to move Objects}

dialog.title: title:{Fence Me In}
dialog.description: description:{Some fences will help keep the Sheep from wandering off into danger.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now the sheep have a safe place to graze.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Should be Place 2 Trees}
hint_2:{Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{For the Birds}
dialog.description: description:{Some new trees would add some cheer to the kingdom and give my bird friends a good home!}
dialog.finish: finish:{I love the sound of birdies in the morning!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends. Sell items from your Inventory.}

dialog.title: title:{Beasty Protection}
dialog.description: description:{All living things deserve protecting, even the beasties! We should stop hurting them!}
dialog.finish: finish:{This is the right thing to do, isn't it?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Let 5 Beasties live in your Kingdom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties}

dialog.title: title:{Beasty Collection}
dialog.description: description:{Even the beasties deserve a safe place to live away from the Gloom.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Oh my! The beasties are cute in their own way, I suppose.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Let 5 Beasties live in your Kingdom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties}
hint_2:{Craft at a Kitchen or Trade with Friends}
hint_3:{Click Design Mode to move Objects}

dialog.title: title:{Beasty Confection}
dialog.description: description:{Help! The beasties keep trying to eat the other animals. We need to feed them something!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Yikes! They nearly took my hand along with the treats! I hopes this keeps them busy.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Beasties to Banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Beasty Rejection}
dialog.description: description:{Oops! Alistaire explained to me that beasties are actually made of Gloom! They need to go!}
dialog.finish: finish:{I thought I was helping real animals, but they were part of the Gloom all along. My bad!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Explore to reveal Tom's location}
hint_2:{Click on Tom to gift him a sword}

dialog.title: title:{Good Knight Tom}
dialog.description: description:{There is a cave that will help push back the GLOOM. Find Tom. He may have seen it.}
dialog.finish: finish:{That new Sword you gave to Tom is a mighty weapon! I'm sure he will help you.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Find Tom and help him prepare to fight the dragon.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Ropes at the Workshop.}

dialog.title: title:{Snare}
dialog.description: description:{I have a idea! I can catch it with some rope. This is a great idea don't you think?}
dialog.finish: finish:{I better have you show me how to tie a knot again. Big Footy broke free, very easily.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Build up your strength by moving things in your kingdom.}
hint_2:{Click on a tree to chop it.}
hint_2:{Energy potions can be purchased in the Market and drunk from your inventory.}

dialog.title: title:{Prepare for Dragon Facing}
dialog.description: description:{You need to toughen up a wee bit if you plan to be clearing caves.}
dialog.finish: finish:{That work has the inner fires burning. Moving Rocks is good practice for cave exploring.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Find Tom and help him prepare to fight the dragon.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place the Great Hall from Your Inventory}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Find 1 Trap in your Inventory and place it in the Kingdom.}

dialog.title: title:{Placing the Trap}
dialog.description: description:{The trap is finished! Just place where you want.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The perfect spot to catch Big Footy! I think we need more items to bait the trap properly.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Find the Crystal Cave in the Gloom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the map area to explore the Crystal Cave}
hint_1:{Click on Goblins to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{The Crystal Cave Defended}
dialog.description: description:{If my memory serves, I believe the cave was in this area.}
dialog.finish: finish:{There is a Dragon in that cave? By Nessie, I haven't seen one of them for many years.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Explore to find the Crystal Cave to see if there truly is a dragon.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Dragon to attack it}

dialog.title: title:{Brute Force Attack}
dialog.description: description:{The first thing to learn about Dragons is that they are dangerous. But a straight attack looks like the only choice.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Well, that went poorly indeed. I suggest you try something else.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Attack the Dragon to drive it out of the Crystal Cave.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Fish to get Pails of Water}
hint_2:{Click on the Dragon to dowse it with water}

dialog.title: title:{Use Yer Noggin}
dialog.description: description:{The second thing to learn about Dragons is that they breathe fire. You need to block that.}
dialog.finish: finish:{By heather, Pails of Water made no difference to that fire. We need a new tactic.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Fish to get Pails of Water.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Chickens to acquire Eggs}
hint_2:{Click on the Dragon to pelt it with eggs}

effect.message: message1:{EMBER: Oh please help me find my egg!}

dialog.title: title:{Dragon-Logical Warfare}
dialog.description: description:{The third thing to know about Dragons is that they're proud. Throwing Eggs at her ought to bring her out.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Very strange, that is, if those Eggs have started the Dragon weeping?}
dialog.hint: hint:{Throw eggs at the Dragon.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Grass to Clear it}
hint_2:{Click on Water to Fish}
hint_3:{Clear Flowers to find Honey}

dialog.title: title:{Flies to Honey}
dialog.description: description:{I've heard if you kiss a frog it might become a prince! Could you help me find some frogs to kiss?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Yeeuck! All that kissing and all I have to show for it is the taste of flies in my mouth.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends}
hint_3:{Buy in the Animals tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Beauty Rest}
dialog.description: description:{Sleeping damsels are awoke with a kiss from a handsome prince, right? I'll need a good sleeping aid.}
dialog.finish: finish:{(Yawwn) How long was I out? Hmm - still no prince, and now I have a splitting headache!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Find by Fishing or Collect from a Fishery}
hint_2:{Find by Fishing}
hint_3:{Click on Water to Fish}

dialog.title: title:{Siren Song}
dialog.description: description:{My mother was a siren. Maybe I can disguise myself as a mermaid and echant a prince with song.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Peew! It's hard to charm anyone when you smell like dead trout! I need to go take a bath.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Great Hall to buy Castle Buildings}
hint_2:{Find by Banishing Wolves}
hint_3:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}

dialog.title: title:{Hairy Tale}
dialog.description: description:{Who wouldn't rescue a damsel in distress? I'll lock myself up in a tower. And I'll need hair extensions.}
dialog.finish: finish:{No good. Have you ever tried to let someone climb your hair? It HURTS.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops}

dialog.title: title:{Spinning Wheels}
dialog.description: description:{A king has offered his son's hand to any woman that can spin straw into gold! It's worth a try.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I think all I spun this straw into is a bad case of hay fever - achoo!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Buildings tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Buy in the Buildings tab of the Market}
hint_3:{Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{Playing Dirty}
dialog.description: description:{It's a bit weird, but I've heard a girl met a prince after living with several short miners. You buying this?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Let's never speak of this again.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Get 20 Cotton Cloth for a Gown}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_3:{Real task is Visit 1 Neighbor}

dialog.title: title:{If the Shoe Fits}
dialog.description: description:{A neighboring kingdom is throwing a ball! I'll show up and ''accidentally'' leave behind a slipper.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Glass slippers certainly are not made for dancing!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Craft at a Kitchen or Trade with Friends.}

dialog.title: title:{Hoodwinked}
dialog.description: description:{It's risky, but running through the forest with treats attracts wolves. And maybe a brave rescuer?}
dialog.finish: finish:{A dozen wolf attacks and not a single rescue - chivalry is dead!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Find the Dragon Egg in the Gloom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the map area to explore and find the Dragon Egg}

dialog.title: title:{Dragon Egg Hunt}
dialog.description: description:{The Dragon said her egg was taken east. I suggest you look here.}
dialog.finish: finish:{This might be where the egg was taken. Lots of guards here to keep people away.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Explore to search for the Dragon Egg.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Weapons Rack from the Market}
hint_2:{Buy 1 Archery Target from the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Equipment}
dialog.description: description:{What this kingdom needs is more powerful equipment!}
dialog.finish: finish:{That’s a great rack you have there!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Barracks}

dialog.title: title:{Fortification}
dialog.description: description:{This next step is my favorite. Forni – er, fortification!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Aye, that should help with our Beastie problem!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Ropes at the Workshop or Trade with your Neighbors for it}
hint_2:{Oak Tree Wood can be found in expansion areas. Craft Oak Planks at the WorkshopCraft Oak Planks at the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Building the Trap}
dialog.description: description:{This will take a lot of materials, but it is time to build a trap that will hold Big Footy.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I'll need some time to finish this trap. Come back soon and see how it is going. I hope Big Footy won't be angry with me.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Goblins to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{A Strong Guard}
dialog.description: description:{I'd wager these Thieves are hiding something you want.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Unpleasant, that lot was. Now search for the egg.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Banish the thieves that stole Ember's egg.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Watch Tower from the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Protection}
dialog.description: description:{A Watch Tower will give us some much-needed protection!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Fortification is more fun when we have the Town Watch!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft the Fried Fish in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it}
hint_2:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need.}
hint_3:{Get Berries from clearing grasses. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.}

dialog.title: title:{Baiting the Trap}
dialog.description: description:{Let's bait this trap with all the creatures favorite foods!}
dialog.finish: finish:{All we can do now is wait for it come sniffing around around again. I can't wait to see it! I hope it is friendly!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Rocks to search}
hint_2:{Click on Ember to give her egg back.}

effect.message: message1:{EMBER: Oh thank you! But I'm stuck!}

dialog.title: title:{It Must Be Here Somewhere}
dialog.description: description:{Where do you hide a Dragon egg, you ask? In Rock piles, says I.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Great piles of peat! That was a heavy egg! I hope there is still a wee Dragon inside.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Search for and return Ember's egg.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 6 Bubbling Grog}

dialog.title: title:{Drink Up Me Hearty}
dialog.description: description:{There's nothing like a mug of Grog after a long day of fortification.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I may've had a gouple Crogs too many!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Click the Trap to Free George}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Trap to cut George free}

dialog.title: title:{Free Me!}
dialog.description: description:{Help! My name is George I didn't mean any harm. I just couldn't resist the free goodies! Help get me free!}
dialog.finish: finish:{I love that little kld. He leaves me goodies! If it is your wish my lige, I'd love to live here.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Sticks of Butter.}
hint_2:{Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Ropes.}
hint_3:{Click on Ember to free her from the cave.}

effect.message: message1:{EMBER: I'm free! Thank you!}

dialog.title: title:{Happy But Stuck}
dialog.description: description:{In her rush to come out for the egg the Dragon got wedged in. You need to get her out.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Butter is good on many things, but I never thought I would like it on a Dragon! Off she goes with her egg!}
dialog.hint: hint:{Gather butter and rope to help un-stick the Dragon.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Perform actions or explore to find Beasties}

dialog.title: title:{Beat the Beastie}
dialog.description: description:{I could really go for a rousing round of Beastie beating!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Beastie beating is the perfect way to polish off the day!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Thieves to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{The Egg Guards Are Back}
dialog.description: description:{It was a relief to see that Dragon fly off, your Majesty, but the cave is not yet yours.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The cave is yours now and fairly won. Somebody tried hard to keep you out of it. I wonder why.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Banish the thieves and claim your Crystal Cave.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Blacksmith from the Market and build it}

dialog.title: title:{Hammered}
dialog.description: description:{Could you build me a Blacksmith? I've got a whole lot of sword polishing to do.}
dialog.finish: finish:{This looks like a great place to get hammered!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Candles.}
hint_2:{Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Pickaxes.}

dialog.title: title:{The Crystal Cave}
dialog.description: description:{Restore that cave and it will prove to a steady source of expansion crystals. Well done, your Majesty.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Excellent, your Majesty. Return to the cave each day to gather Crystals.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Collect candles and pickaxes to supply your Crystal Cave.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Chop Pine Trees to gather 5 Pine Logs}
hint_2:{Mine Rocks to gather 5 Iron Ore}

dialog.title: title:{Fired Up}
dialog.description: description:{To get our new Blacksmith fired up, we'll need some Wood and Ore}
dialog.finish: finish:{Hard wood and dirty Ore? This is my kind of kingdom!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 2 Iron Bars}

dialog.title: title:{Bar Scene}
dialog.description: description:{Let's put the Blacksmith to work banging out some Iron Bars!}
dialog.finish: finish:{These Iron Bars are just what I need to make Grog barrels!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Explore 1 Gloomy Area}

dialog.title: title:{HUGE Tracts of Land}
dialog.description: description:{What do you say we explore more of your bountiful lands?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Your vast hills are breathtaking!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Search Grass for Sonja's Chest}
hint_3:{Real task is Search the Chest}

dialog.title: title:{Sonja's Booty}
dialog.description: description:{I've got more booty hidden around here somewhere. Can you give me a hand?}
dialog.finish: finish:{I was hoping for a porthole, but an anchor is good, too. Here you go!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Beasties to Bash}
hint_2:{Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends}
hint_3:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}

dialog.title: title:{The Savage Beast}
dialog.description: description:{Since there aren’t any good men around here, maybe I can transform a beast into a gentleman suitor.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Eeeek! Wolves do NOT like wearing pants!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_3:{Real task is Visit 5 Neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Career Woman}
dialog.description: description:{I’m done with men for a while. I love to sing. Maybe with some new clothes I can start a singing career.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I love my new clothes. I’m inspired already!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Animals tab of the Market}
hint_2:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_3:{Real task is Visit 10 Neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Color Girl}
dialog.description: description:{I need a new look for my next show. I’m thinking LOTS of color and red hair!}
dialog.finish: finish:{My fans will love all the colorful feathers!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends.}
hint_3:{Real task is Visit 15 Neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Wild Thing}
dialog.description: description:{I’ve got another act coming up and I want a look that’s a bit more dangerous. }
dialog.finish: finish:{The leather look is really popular with my fans.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Mine Rocks to find Rubies}
hint_2:{Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends.}
hint_3:{Real task is Visit 20 Neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Shining Star}
dialog.description: description:{Thanks to you I’ve become a huge success! Some big jewels would show everyone how far I’ve come.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Oooh! I love the way they sparkle!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}
hint_2:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Place 3 Barrels to Store the fan Mail}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.}

dialog.title: title:{Fan Mail}
dialog.description: description:{I’ve finally found love – from all my fans! I have so much fan mail to respond to!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Fame has its hardships. I’m getting a terrible cramp in my wrist.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Armory from the Market and build it}

dialog.title: title:{Feeling Armorous}
dialog.description: description:{Armories are full of Swords, Spears, and Clubs. What could be better?}
dialog.finish: finish:{I think I've found my new favorite place!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 5 Leather}
hint_2:{Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 5 Iron Bars}
hint_3:{Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 5 Steel Wool}

dialog.title: title:{Leather and Steel}
dialog.description: description:{You know what could be fun? Getting some Leather and Steel...}
dialog.finish: finish:{I'm sure I'll think of SOMETHING interesting to do with these...}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 1 Steel Sword}

dialog.title: title:{Long and Short of It}
dialog.description: description:{My faithful cutlass isn't what it used to be. Could you get me a new Sword?}
dialog.finish: finish:{It's a bit shorter than the last one, but what matters is how you use it!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 1 Practice Dummy}

dialog.title: title:{Swordplay}
dialog.description: description:{I'll need to get used to this new Sword. Can you get me a Practice Dummy?}
dialog.finish: finish:{You know what they say: practice makes perfect!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Banish 5 Beasties}

dialog.title: title:{Duel Citizen}
dialog.description: description:{There's no one around to engage in swordplay with, so how about we beat some Beasties instead?}
dialog.finish: finish:{A few good thrusts always finishes them off!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Watch Tower from the Market}

dialog.title: title:{More Protection}
dialog.description: description:{The Beasties are getting bolder. We could use another protective Tower.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The more protection the better, I always say!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Cottage from the Market and build it}

dialog.title: title:{Golden Rule}
dialog.description: description:{You know I love Bungalows, but a Cottage would provide more gold!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Keep building houses, and soon you'll need your own Treasure Chest!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on 1 Cottage to collect taxes}

dialog.title: title:{Pillaging}
dialog.description: description:{Taxing sounds so boring. Go PILLAGE that Cottage!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Taxing, pillaging... it's all the same thing, really!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Explore 1 Gloomy Area}

dialog.title: title:{Head Out}
dialog.description: description:{I'm feeling adventurous. Let's head out into the Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish:{You never know what you'll find when you explore!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Search for Sonja's chest}
hint_3:{Real task is Search the Chest}

dialog.title: title:{Sonja's Plunder}
dialog.description: description:{The last of my loot is around her somewhere!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Ah, the figurehead! The best part of any ship!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom}
hint_2:{Banish any Gloom Rats in the newly Explored Area}
hint_3:{Banish any Gloom Wolves in the newly Explored Area}

dialog.title: title:{Strange Rumors}
dialog.description: description:{There are rumors that there is an area Gloomier than we've seen before. Follow the Slimy River to its source.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I was afraid the rumors were true. We have some work to do to spread happiness to the area.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Gloom Roots to clear them}
hint_2:{Click Dead Trees to clear them}

dialog.title: title:{The Tainted Tree}
dialog.description: description:{Tainted roots everywhere! We have found the long cursed Lamont Tree. We must stop its spreading corruption.}
dialog.finish: finish:{The taint has sunk deep into the soil. We must dig deeper to cleanse this place.}

condition.hint: hint:{Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom}
hint_2:{Banish any Gloom Wolves in the newly Explored Area}
hint_3:{Banish any Goblins in the newly Explored Area}

dialog.title: title:{The Deep Swamp}
dialog.description: description:{We need to see the source of this foul disease on the Land. Explore deeper into the Lamont Swamp.}
dialog.finish: finish:{So, this is the infamous Lamont Tree. It is as mighty as it is frightening. It still must be destroyed.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy and Place 1 Bridge over the Slimy River}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy a bridge from the Market and place so you can path over the river to the great Lamont Tree}
hint_2:{Click Gloom Roots to clear them}

dialog.title: title:{Bridge over Troubled Water}
dialog.description: description:{Getting close to Lamont is a must. Place a bridge cross over the Foul River to the island.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Now we can get a good look at this abomination! It is more alive than I would have guessed.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Bubbly Grog at the Kitchen}
hint_2:{Craft Dye Kits at the Studio or Trade with Neighbors for it}
hint_3:{Clearing Grasses and Mushrooms will sometimes give you Toadstools}

dialog.title: title:{Concocting Tree Wither}
dialog.description: description:{The external roots are gone, now let's take care of the main tap root! Bring me items to clean the water of it's gloom.}
dialog.finish: finish:{Great! I should have this potion for you very soon. Robbing the tree of nutrients should weaken it.

condition.message: condition_1:{Pour the Cleansing Potion into the Slimy River}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Slimy River around the Lamont Tree, the potion will do the rest}

dialog.title: title:{Root Roundup}
dialog.description: description:{Take this potion and pour it into the Slimy River. It will do all the work!}
dialog.finish: finish:{Look, the mighty Lamont has started to wither! You have made a lot of progress!

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft an Iron Axe at the Workshop}
hint_2:{Craft Bags of Nails at the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors for it}
hint_3:{Craft Horseshoes at the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors for it}

dialog.title: title:{Tough as Nails}
dialog.description: description:{Even in this weakened state, you'll need a special axe to chop down Lamont. I'll make you one if you get these ingredients.}
dialog.finish: finish:{I'll get this axe as sharp as an axe has ever been. Visit me soon for the results.

condition.message: condition_1:{Pour the Cleansing Potion into the Slimy River}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Slimy River around the Lamont Tree, the potion will do the rest}

dialog.title: title:{Shock and Awe}
dialog.description: description:{This should peel back the rest of the bark. Throw this at Lamont. Just don't miss!}
dialog.finish: finish:{A boy inside? What kind of evil would do this? We'll need stronger magic to free him.

condition.message: condition_1:{Chop Down the mighty Lamont Tree}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Lamont Tree to chop it}

dialog.title: title:{Timber!}
dialog.description: description:{Take this Axe and take that wretched tree down!}
dialog.finish: finish:{The tree refused to be cut, hmm. Let me see that piece of Bark. It's hard like iron. I'll study it.

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Tomato Bisque at the Kitchen}
hint_2:{Craft Ink at the Studio or Trade with Neighbors for it}
hint_3:{Retrieved from chopping at the Great Lamont Tree}

dialog.title: title:{Thorny Issue}
dialog.description: description:{The bark is the clue we needed! Gather more items for a potion that will strip the tree of its bark.}
dialog.finish: finish:{With a few incantations, these ingredients that can melt an axe!

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Chocolate Bars at the Kitchen]
hint_2:{Craft Cakes at the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it}
hint_3:{Get Milk from feeding Cows}

dialog.title: title:{Trust Issues}
dialog.description: description:{Faugrimm did something to my food that changed me. I'm so hungry. You won't poison me, will you?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Mmm, just like Mom's. My stomach hurts now.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Use the Magic Wand to Free the Boy}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Slimy River around the Lamont Tree, the potion will do the rest}

dialog.title: title:{Save the Boy!}
dialog.description: description:{Take my trusty Magic Wand, it should be able to free the boy from his prison. Be careful though it has a kick.}
dialog.finish: finish:{A young boy, he will be a fine addition to your kingdom!

condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Baz's house, near where you found him, once you have all the ingredients necessary to inflate it]
hint_2:{Gain enough experience to be level 21}

dialog.title: title:{Tricked}
dialog.description: description:{Hi there, an evil old man tricked me and I was turned into a tree so long ago! He promised to fix my house, will you?}
dialog.finish: finish:{The old man's name that did this to me was Faugrimm. I hate him! Can't talk now, gotta go play!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy a bridge from the Market and place so you can path over the river to the great Lamont Tree}
hint_2:{Buy Dragon Horns from the Decoration Section of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Dragons}
dialog.description: description:{Dragons are really cool, don't you think? I wanna let everyone know they are real!}
dialog.finish: finish:{I did see a cool big red dragon near a cave. Let me know if you see it!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Aye, this is a respectable Castle with good prospects for growth. This kingdom may be to my liking.}

dialog.title: title:{Training Starts Soon}
dialog.description: description:{Aye, I can help train knights for you, your Majesty.}
dialog.finish: finish:{This is a start, your Majesty. Give me the boys and I'll give you back the men.}

description.text: Agile old knight, don't let his belly fool you.

happycallout.text: I wish the kingdom was more exciting, I'm bored.
Thanks for all that you've done. I'm happy with our kingdom!
Wow the kingdom is really looking great. I'm excited to be a part of it!

description.text: Loves to entertain, enjoys pointy hats and eggs.

happycallout.text: Thanks for your help but it's still pretty boring around here.
Wow that's exactly what I needed. I'm happy to be here!
Holy smokes this town is an egg lover's dream! I'm excited to live here!

description.text: A voice so sweet that animals flock to hear her.

happycallout.text: The birds don't sing enough in this kingdom.
This kingdom is beautiful, I could sing all day!
I'm excited to live here! The birds and butterflies are astounding!

description.text: Dragons will one day tremble before him, but not yet!

happycallout.text: Kids like me aren't scared of dragons!

description.text: The only viking known to have a pet rock.
No frog is safe from her kiss.
